Having said that, theres a smaller market under it, which is basically every firm under it, fortune 5000 or middle market, a couple of hundred million dollar companies that probably have some very similar issues and thinking that they would need but that they dont have and cant access. And so my deal goal would be to figure out how to develop and sell marketing in a product that can get to a much broader base. Again, thats why I meant lower touch. That allows us to diversify our business stream into a much larger set of clients. Like our clients normally range somewhere in around a dozen range, but if one of the dozen goes away, it is normally a significant revenue hit because theyre all large versus if you have a dozen large ones but then you have 1000 small ones, its easier to buffer stuff out. So that would be my goal with anything that is AI based. The reason why with AI, because it allows you to do a lot manual things faster and more efficiently that for us, with our structure right now, might not be profitable if we try to do them manually.
